text: 9.31 Jop 35.12, Sng 34.15, 66.18, Snd 15.29, Ais 1.15, Jer 11.11, Mai 3.4, Sek 7.13 Pen chɨn nopun, binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok, kɨli God nop agnɨgɨnɨgabal tek ma gɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb pen God nop gos anep lɨl kɨdek gɨl, yɨb nop dad aplanɨbal okok, kɨli God nop agnɨgɨnɨgabal tek gɨnɨgab agak.
